VESA FB modes

Hexadecimal:
Colors		640x480	800x600	1024x768 1280x1024 1600x1200
8 bits		0x301	0x303	0x305	 0x307	   0x31C
15 bits		0x310	0x313	0x316	 0x319	   0x31D
16 bits		0x311	0x314	0x317	 0x31A	   0x31E
24 or 32 bits	0x312	0x315	0x318	 0x31B	   0x31F

Decimal:
Colors		640x480	800x600	1024x768 1280x1024 1600x1200
8 bits		769	771	773	 791	   796
15 bits		784	787	790	 793	   797
16 bits		785	788	791	 794	   798
24 or 32 bits	786	789	792	 795	   799

0x310 = 768 + 16 = 784
